about_the_game:
Wake Natsume from her slumber to make her powerful abilities your own! Equipped with a big mouth and skill to match it, Natsume will use her various bullets to inflict status ailments on your enemies or rain hell upon them.

*DLC characters can be recruited upon completion of the first quest.
detailed_description:
